name: executive_summary
description: Professional executive summary report template for vulnerability assessments, designed for C-level and senior management consumption
author: OpenVAS AI-Enhanced Reporting System

required_variables.name: company_name
required_variables.description: Name of the organization conducting the assessment

required_variables.name: company_logo
required_variables.description: Path to company logo image file

required_variables.name: client_name
required_variables.description: Name of the client organization being assessed

required_variables.name: report_title
required_variables.description: Title of the vulnerability assessment report

required_variables.name: report_date
required_variables.description: Date when the report was generated

required_variables.name: assessment_period
required_variables.description: Time period during which the assessment was conducted

optional_variables.name: confidentiality_risk_count
optional_variables.description: Number of vulnerabilities affecting data confidentiality

optional_variables.name: availability_risk_count
optional_variables.description: Number of vulnerabilities affecting system availability

optional_variables.name: integrity_risk_count
optional_variables.description: Number of vulnerabilities affecting data integrity

optional_variables.name: immediate_actions
optional_variables.default_value: \item Review critical vulnerabilities\n\item Implement emergency patches

optional_variables.name: short_term_actions
optional_variables.default_value: \item Address high-severity vulnerabilities\n\item Update security policies

optional_variables.name: long_term_actions
optional_variables.default_value: \item Implement security awareness training\n\item Regular vulnerability assessments

optional_variables.name: top_vulnerabilities_table
optional_variables.description: LaTeX table content for top vulnerabilities
optional_variables.default_value: No critical vulnerabilities identified & N/A & N/A & System appears secure \\\hline

optional_variables.name: risk_trend_analysis
optional_variables.description: Analysis of risk trends over time
optional_variables.default_value: This is the first assessment for this environment. Future assessments will provide trend analysis.

optional_variables.name: strategic_recommendations
optional_variables.default_value: \item Establish regular vulnerability management program\n\item Implement security awareness training

optional_variables.name: tactical_recommendations
optional_variables.default_value: \item Apply security patches promptly\n\item Configure systems according to security baselines

optional_variables.name: technical_lead_name
optional_variables.description: Name of technical lead for the assessment
